sentences: A draft decision being prepared by developing countries has stirred some concern in the corridors.
The draft proposal would limit the decision on capacity building to climate change considerations.
Supporters of an all-encompassing approach to capacity building argue that their approach would be cost effective and more consistent with the associated benefits of sustainable development.

However, those in support of focusing capacity building on climate change stress that it must follow the mandate of the FCCC if the limited pot of funding is to be used effectively and produce tangible results.
They say decisions on comprehensive capacity building must await a maturing of linkages across Convention institutions.
enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
